comments:
Description: NullPointerException is thrown out when undo dragging a label 
from palette view into outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Drag a label from palette view to outline view.
2. Undo add this element.
3. Redo.

Actual result: NullPointerException is thrown out.
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.editors.schematic.providers.Schema
ticContextMenuProvider.getMultiSelectedElement
(SchematicContextMenuProvider.java:668)

ticContextMenuProvider.buildContextMenu(SchematicContextMenuProvider.java:182)

(ContextMenuProvider.java:60)

(MenuManager.java:285)

(MenuManager.java:372)

(MenuManager.java:386)

(TypedListener.java:117)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control.windowProc(Control.java:3064)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Decorations.windowProc
(Decorations.java:1582)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Menu._setVisible(Menu.java:225)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runPopups(Display.java:3106)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:2707)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:1699)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runUI(Workbench.java:1663)

	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:334)

*** Bug 115737 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

In this case, the current editpart is empty edit part which doesn't have DE report element instance as model.
Check this specail case to avoid NPE.

At present, no NPE, but still report BIRT error dialog.
Because libraries can never hold template report items since it can not define any
template parameter definition.
